content: I saved my file and tried to insert it using Select File. When I do that, it says C:\fakepath\ps0.py, and I can't do anything else. When I reload the page, that section clears. I can't tell if my homework is submitted or not. Could some please help me? Thank you very much.
subject: How do I submit PSET 0?

content:
I had the same issue yesterday, but it turns out I just wasn't logged into the website.  You can check near the upper right hand corner.  Is this the case with you?  

^^ this worked!! TYSM <3
I have the same issue, even while I'm logged in. Any idea what could be happening?
Or, is there a way to know whether your submission has been uploaded or not?
For me, I could tell mine was submitted BC it showed me an option to download my latest submission.
